title: How do I fill out the FL-345 correctly ?
question: What box or boxes do I mark and where do I list the personal property assets. We have no real estate, no home, and no business to divide. Only personal belongings & misc. items that are being divided as agreed upon in our settlement agreement.
answers: The Property Order Attachment is designed to be self-explanatory, and should set forth who gets what items in section 1c and 1d, and who takes what debts in section 2c and 2d. If you have difficulty understanding what goes where in that form, go to your Superior Court's Self-Help Clinic for assistance from a volunteer lawyer.

The Property Order Attachment is designed to be self-explanatory, and should set forth who gets what items in section 1c and 1d, and who takes what debts in section 2c and 2d. If you have difficulty understanding what goes where in that form, go to your Superior Court's Self-Help Clinic for assistance from a volunteer lawyer.
